> Is it possible to make the textui TestRunner use a new classloader

You could subclass junit.textui.TestRunner and overwrite getLoader() 
with the implementation from junit.runner.BaseTestRunner, edit 
~/junit.properties and set "loading" to "true", and then use your 
subclass for running the tests.
